bibl.title: 'The Lilies of the Field' Reconsidered: Codex Sinaiticus and the Gospel of Thomas.
bibl.note: Discusses the possible influence of a contemporary document (Gospel of Thomas) containing a specific form of a saying of Jesus (P. Oxy. IV, 655 = van Haelst 595) which may have influenced a scribe of the Codex Sinaiticus.
bibl.seg: JONGKIND Dirk, 'The Lilies of the Field' Reconsidered: Codex Sinaiticus and the Gospel of Thomas.

Discusses the possible influence of a contemporary document (Gospel of Thomas) containing a specific form of a saying of Jesus (P. Oxy. IV, 655 = van Haelst 595) which may have influenced a scribe of the Codex Sinaiticus.
